features: Anti Colic Glass Baby Bottles - The safer choice for your baby. Our baby bottles feature a Natursutten anti-colic valve that ensures natural milk flow, removing air bubbles and gas to prevent spit-up and even colic. Our baby bottle nipples are derived from the same natural rubber as Natursutten pacifiers. Each baby glass bottle is made from thermal shock-resistant borosilicate glass and is free of BPA, BPS and other harmful chemicals that can leach from plastic bottles

Baby Bottles for Breastfed Babies - Natursutten newborn baby bottles are perfect for mothers who pump and store breast milk. Glass baby bottles can go from freezer to refrigerator to hot water, all in one step, and they are dishwasher and microwave safe. Ultimately, the best baby bottles for newborns are the ones your baby will take. Our soft natural rubber nipples and anti-colic double valve work to ease the transition from breast to bottle and eliminate baby's discomfort

Baby Bottle Set - This set of two slow flow bottles for newborn babies includes two glass bottles for babies, two slow flow natural rubber nipples, two anti-colic double valves, two threaded bottle rings, two bottle seals for storage, and two snug-fit caps for travel and storage - you simply choose between 8 oz glass baby bottles best for 6-12 months, or 4 oz baby bottles for newborns and younger babies 0-6 months

Better for Your Baby and Our Planet - Established in 2006 and created by a mother of three, Natursutten offers natural products for babies and toddlers - baby essentials like pacifiers, pacifier accessories, baby bottles and teether toys. We adhere to the strictest European and US safety standards. Our eco-friendly packaging is made from paper certified by the Forest Stewardship Council and printed with natural soy ink. Even the clear window is made of bioplastic - from corn, not petroleum.

Boy and Girl Baby Shower Gifts - Looking to find a unique, must-have baby shower gift not already on the typical baby registry that mom will actually use? Your baby registry search stops here! A few great baby bottles are newborn essentials, as new parents may have to experiment to figure out what works best for their child

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The 100% natural rubber line of pacifiers made in Italy. Natursutten pacifiers are made with all-natural rubber, with no BPA, phthalates, or chemical softening agents. The patented, one-piece design is free of joints or cracks where bacteria can accumulate, and the pacifiers are easier to clean. Crafted in Italy by a family-run business, each Natursutten pacifier takes 7 weeks and 20 hand-held steps to go from liquid sap to finished product. Since the rubber from the Hevea Brasiliensis tree is softer than the silicone in mass-produced pacifiers, your baby will enjoy a gentler, more natural feel.

PACIPIXY & PACIPOUCH SAFER BY DESIGN Baby Bottle made in France of borosilicate glass, which is dishwasher-safe and thermal shock-resistant (withstands extreme temperature changes, like boiling or freezing). Nipple made in Italy of all-natural rubber, which is free of harmful chemicals. Its natural softness creates a feeding-experience that more closely simulates breastfeeding. Anti-colic double-valve ensures a more even milk-flow, preventing colic and gas. NATURAL RUBBER Made from liquid rubber milk from sustainably harvested rubber trees.Natural rubber is softer than siliconeCrafted in Italy by a family-run business, each Natursutten nipple takes 7 weeks and 20 hand-held steps to go from liquid sap to finished product.Natural rubber has no BPA, phthalates, or chemical softening agents. WHICH MODEL DO I CHOOSE? Natursutten Baby bottles are available in two sizes: 110ml or 240ml. Babies love our Natursutten products. This can be mainly due to the soft rubber, which feels more natural than the artificial silicone of conventional commercially manufactured soothers.

When you buy a Natursutten pacifier, you and your baby avoid Allergy-causing substancesArtificial colorsHormone-disturbing substancesChemical softenersParabens, PVC, and phthalates You get a product that is made from 100% natural material, better for your baby and the environment.
Original - round Original - orthodontic Butterfly - round Butterfly - orthodontic 110ml 240ml

ALL NATURAL Our commitment to a better Earth doesn’t end with the all-natural rubber in our pacifiers. Our packaging is made from recognized paper and printed with natural soy ink. Even the clear window is made of bio plastic—from corn, not petroleum.

The Natursutten Story Anne-Dorthe Schroeder started Natursutten (which means 'natural pacifier' in Danish) in 2006 when she couldn’t find a healthy option for her newborn son. “The media is full of stories about toxic baby gear, recalls, and harmful plastics. As a new mother, I thought about how many hours my son was going to have a pacifier in his mouth, and I was determined to find a truly safe alternative. I felt I owed it to my child and other babies around the world – to do better.”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Ant-Colic Bottle
reviews.reviewText: This bottle is fantastic. I have had to bottle feed my baby since she was 2 weeks old due to tongue and lip ties. I have also had to feed her formula exclusively because of not producing milk. I have tried multiple bottles: Playtex, Kiinde, Mam, Chico, Nuk, and more importantly Dr. Brown's. Out of all of these Dr. Brown's was the best, but definitely still not great. My baby was still in pain and uncomfortable after eating, and I wanted something better. After further researching anti-colic bottles I came across Natursutten bottles, and they have changed everything. My baby still has to burp, but she does not get the painful gas that would last several hours. Her reflux has improved, and she is much more calm and happy after eating. I am not using the nipples it comes with because my baby can't handle faster flow, even the slow ones are too fast for her. She will be able to use them in a few months, though. For now she uses Dr. Brown's nipples, and they work well even with the anti colic valve. I'm so thankful to this company for designing a product that is so simple and much more efficient at reducing air intake during bottle feeding. Also, not having as many complicated parts to wash is a nice perk. They are also durable, I have dropped them in my stainless steel sink a few times on top of each other and they didn't even chip. I don't do that often and have changed how I wash them in the sink because they are glass and glass is breakable, no matter how well it is made. That said, these are definitely worth the price, and as far as I am concerned the best anti-colic bottles money can buy. I now use Natursutten bottles exclusively and will never go back to other brands. If your bottle fed baby struggles with feeding and has difficulty with gas, reflux, etc., please consider these for your little one. I have had so many problems with other bottles causing intense discomfort and pain for my baby, and these have improved her comfort and enjoyment of feeds by 90-99%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby loves these bottles…
reviews.reviewText: Slow feed nipple, glass bottle, easy to see through. Perfect bottle after trying several others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slowest flow of any bottle we tried
reviews.reviewText: I used this bottle for my newborn during the colostrum milk phase. We tried several glass bottles and this nipple was the slowest flow of all we tried. Once my milk came in, baby no longer had patience with this slow flow nipple. I really love these bottles but wish the nipple didn’t have a notch / was more sloped like a breast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The right thing to do for my baby
reviews.reviewText: I bought some 4 and 8 ounce glass bottles for my newborn because I didn’t want to add even more plastic contaminants into her life. Plastic is hard to avoid nowadays but it seems like every day you hear more research about forever chemicals, micro plastic, and plastic pollution. Every day we learn more about the long term consequences to our kids’ health and development. We take so many precautions with our kids and we put so much effort into helping them have the best life every day, it doesn’t make much sense to give them something dangerous to suck on all day long.These glass bottles are tough and stand up to some abuse, and they’re super easy to keep clean. The natural latex nipples are great too. Took our kids a couple days to get used to them after getting plastic ones at the hospital, but it was a minimal effort. After several months one of the nipples was getting extra tacky and I learned that that’s normal and not a big deal, but we just replaced it with a new nipple. They’re not expensive.I don’t know how much safer exactly these bottles and nipples are than plastic ones, but I know that they simply are and for me that’s worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality, baby did not take the nipple
reviews.reviewText: Love that there's no plastic in these. Baby did not like the nipple shape - too narrow for her mouth. Wish i started off with these bottles so she could've gotten used to them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby loves them!
reviews.reviewText: My baby loves these bottles and I love that they’re glass. They were gifted to us but now I bought more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These bottles leaked on us and made quite a mess. Also disappointing was the fact that these bottles didn’t thread into the narrow bottle adapter that worked with all the other narrow glass bottles that we’ve tried (Dr browns narrow neck, bibs, etc)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars good quality but could use an update on the anti colic part
reviews.reviewText: these bottles are amazing in almost every way. they are non toxic and the nipple is natural rubber so it’s the best choice for your baby in terms of materials you’re feeding them with. but i have a big issue with their anti colic plastic device. it is supposed to help less air enter your babies stomach, and create a good flow with air and milk, but instead it creates a lot of problems. it makes milk stay in the nipple after use even when l the bottle is turned upright, so unless the baby sucks every ounce of milk gone, whenever you open the lid the contents from the nipple will spill out, and leak everywhere. the bottle also has to be tipped straight up to get enough milk in the nipple at first so they aren’t just sucking air. after that it’s fine. the other thing is with the anti colic piece is it doesn’t let enough milk flow with the fast flow nipples. i tried using these bottles without this anti colic piece but it makes the nipple cave in and your baby would have to open their mouths to allow air to go back in the bottle to replace the liquid they sucked out. i’m working on a solution to these issues, and if you have any ideas let me know. because these still manage to be my all time favorite bottles as any others we’ve tried have just as many cons if not more. i love the design and look of these and just wish something could be done about the milk leaking out of the nipple when it’s opened. anyways i think they’re worth the money because the glass is such high quality compared to most brands. we’ve dropped it many times and it hasn’t broken. they are very easy to clean as well. i think they are worth buying and using over any other brand i know of.
